description: Detects usage of attrib.exe to hide files from users.
false_positives: igfxCUIService.exe hiding *.cui files via .bat script (attrib.exe a child of cmd.exe and igfxCUIService.exe is the parent of the cmd.exe)
name: Hiding Files with Attrib.exe
query: ((process.executable:*\\attrib.exe AND process.command_line:*\ \+h\ *) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:*\\desktop.ini\ * OR (process.parent.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:\+R\ \+H\ \+S\ \+A\ \\*.cui AND process.parent.command_line:C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\*.bat)))))
author: Sami Ruohonen
